Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: From defence rebalancing efforts to scam text message crackdowns Australians are keeping track of the latest updates as they come in from the government. Amid discussions about the future of the Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme pharmacists warn that proposed changes to PBS will harm the already-vulnerable Aussies. As military's communication systems face threats of foreign interference the government vows to invest more in the country's national defence. The future remains unclear as the Federal Government decides which policy changes to implement and when.
